MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Waen Road.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:45am. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32am on 14th February 2021.
